Title: Coronavirus: India May See 25 Crore COVID-19 Cases In Next 3 Months: Report - NDTV News
Description: Coronavirus: To reach these numbers, Johns Hopkins and CDDEP -- a public health research organisation -- used IndiaSIM, a well-validated agent-based model of the Indian population which has been published widely over many years and has been used for governmen…

Title: Coronavirus Treatment: HIV Drug Used To Cure COVID-19 Positive British National In India - International Business Times
Description: Indian doctors have saved the life of a COVID-19 positive British National using anti-HIV medications.

Title: Coronavirus impact: How did Modi govt arrive at 21-day lockdown period and not 14 - International Business Times, India Edition
Description: There is scientific evidence and epidemiological significance to reason out why the Modi government imposed a national lockdown period of 21-days and not lesser than 21.

Title: 90 lakh coronavirus victims in 2 years: Study predicts worst-case scenario in each Indian metro city - Moneycontrol
Description: If one coronavirus infected person infects four people, by the time that cycle happens 10 times, over 10 lakh people are infected, said the study.

Title: Can one have immunith against coronavirus? Antibody tests raise hope - The New Indian Express
Description: Immunity may bring an early treatment to coronavirus as antibodies gathered from the bodies of those who have recovered may be used to help those struggling with the diseasae.

Title: This Korean series predicted coronavirus outbreak 2 years ago. Uncanny similarities - India Today
Description: A Korean series predicted the novel coronavirus outbreak 2 years ago. The uncanny similarities will blow your mind.

Title: Is loss of taste or smell an early warning sign of coronavirus infection? - India TV News
Description: A loss of smell or taste might be an early sign of infection with the coronavirus, say medical experts who cite reports from several countries. It might even serve as a useful screening tool, they say

Title: Coronavirus pandemic: Foreigner treated with HIV drugs for Covid-19 tests negative - India Today
Description: A British national, who had earlier tested positive for Covid-19, responded well to the drugs combination of Ritonavir and Lopinavir (HIV antiretroviral drugs), and his latest test results showed he has tested negative for the virus, a hospital statement said.
